item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (120 points | 29 comments)
2. Show HN: Countless.dev – A website to compare every AI model: LLMs, TTSs, STTs (119 points | 30 comments)
3. Show HN: Scraper for job listings directly from company websites (4 points | 1 comment)
4. Every V4 UUID (1160 points | 327 comments)
5. OpenAI seeks to unlock investment by ditching 'AGI' clause with Microsoft (26 points | 18 comments)
6. Hiroshi Nagai: Japan's Sun-Drenched Americana (102 points | 16 comments)
7. Tell HN: Need help, locked out of Google account with 10 years of personal data (62 points | 12 comments)
8. Next-level frosted glass with backdrop-filter (268 points | 45 comments)
9. The Curse of Recursion: Training on generated data makes models forget (2023) (87 points | 57 comments)
10. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (56 points | 38 comments)
11. FSharpPacker – compile F# scripts to executables (41 points | 6 comments)
12. Biggest shell programs (155 points | 65 comments)
13. My second year without a job (331 points | 468 comments)
14. SpiderBasic (28 points | 18 comments)
15. : The Dialog Element (276 points | 120 comments)
16. Helsing at Eurorust and the Oxidation of Defense (5 points | discuss)
17. Accessing a DRM Framebuffer to display an image (36 points | 5 comments)
18. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (228 points | 78 comments)
19. 21 Algol 60 Compilers in 1962 (31 points | 27 comments)
20. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (184 points | 44 comments)
21. Mistakes as a new manager (224 points | 91 comments)
22. Nucleotide Transformer: building robust foundation models for human genomics (33 points | 5 comments)
23. Mathics 7.0 – Open-source alternative to Mathematica (41 points | 10 comments)
24. Install postmarketOS on Android phone and use Docker as a home server (264 points | 101 comments)
25. MultiQueue-Based FPGA Routing: Relaxed A* Priority Ordering-Improved Parallelism [pdf] (28 points | 2 comments)
26. Structured Outputs with Ollama (211 points | 54 comments)
27. DSPy – Programming–not prompting–LMs (155 points | 27 comments)
28. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (138 points | 72 comments)
29. An invisible desktop application that will help you pass technical interviews (110 points | 112 comments)
30. Does Your Code Pass the Turkey Test? (2008) (113 points | 108 comments)
